CommissionSchedule.name: CommissionSchedule
CommissionSchedule.description: Represents a commission calculation and rate definition. Calculates commission values for a commissionable event.

ApplicableObject.description: The object for which this Commission Schedule calculates commissions.

CalcProcessInputMapping.description: The input mappings from the object fields to the variables used in the commission calculation.

CalcProcessOutput.description: The formula applied to this Commission Schedule’s process output that calculates the final commission amount.

CalcProcessOutputConvNotation.description: An optimized version of the CalcProcessOutput formula that calculates the commission. Not user-editable.

CalculationProcessName.description: The name of the Integration Procedure, Calculation Matrix, or Calculation Procedure this Commission Schedule uses for calculations.

CalculationType.description: The type of calculation or process used when this Commission Schedule is used.

CommissionAmount.description: The commission amount for the Commission Schedule when the process type is Amount.

CommissionRate.description: The commission percentage for the Commission Schedule when the process type is Rate.

CommissionStructureType.description: Indicates whether the commission calculation is Flat or Tiered when the process type is Matrix.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The effective end date of the Commission Schedule.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The effective start date of the Commission Schedule.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Commission Schedule is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Commission Schedule.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

TierDefinition.description: Internal-only. Applies when the CalculationType is CalculationMatrix.
